roleset.name: maintain a position in a certain place, again

role.descr: occupied with what (if separate from arg0)

example.name: Occupy Wallstreet Movement, intransitive usage
example.text: OAKLAND is re-occupying right now amid tear gas and rubber bullets being fired !

example.name: All examples, standard physical usage
example.text: An artist occupied the space with an art installation.
